sentence.text: From his saddlebag he took a length of rope that he knotted as a leash round Nosey 's neck , then he drew his rifle out of the saddle holster , cocked it , and went silently forward .
In addition , slung across his shoulder , Grant carried a coiled rope knotted every two feet to facilitate climbing .
Mrs Browning had a felt hat tied on with a scarf knotted under the chin , a thick tweed suit , woollen gloves , and fleecy-lined suede boots .
He was wearing a blue shirt , a crimson scarf knotted round his neck .
The gambling king stood to one side , wrapped in a black kimono , a white scarf knotted at his throat .
It was a mixture of strange colours and the knitted ties felt scratchy where Gloria knotted them under Dot 's chin .
But he said nothing , just sat down at the table , a pale-faced , freckled child , his school tie knotted to one side , and catching part of his collar .
He padded about in his freedom with a towel knotted round his waist and put some toast to grill .
Sabine sat up , shivered a little in the cool of the early morning air , as Rohan walked in , a towel knotted round his hips , carrying two cups .
He knotted the cord of his dressing-gown and left the room .
I knotted a headscarf round my throat so savagely I nearly choked myself , and crept -- I had to creep , because of Mavis -- downstairs and out into the fog .
She reached for her jacket , knotted the gay red scarf at her throat and tapped at Luke 's door , then went in .
Irritably , Josh knotted his tie and straightened it .
Siegfried had just begun to take the stairs three at a time when his brother descended from the landing , knotting his tie with perfect composure .
He knotted the end of the tie round the other side of the window .
It does not stretch as much as nylon or polyester twist and it knots easily .
They both wore plain silk blouses , pearls and Herms scarves knotted loosely around their throats .
Wild-eyed Furus , bright scarves knotted round their brows , hurled chunks of red iron ore through the plate-glass windows of Government House .
If you have more time , try swagging or knotting the fabric and then secure it in place using swag hooks .
Ashi smiled as she knotted it at her throat .
He felt for the scrap of silk and knotted it loosely around her neck .
He moved quickly to knot the boat 's rope through a ring sunk in the jetty .
He merely shifted position slightly , knotted his fingers more tightly together and continued gazing out of the window .
